title: Palli Karma-Sahayak Foundation (PKSF)
description: The Palli Karma-Sahayak Foundation (PKSF) is a national public sector direct access entity working as a sustainable platform for government to nongovernment organisation collaboration based in Bangladesh, with a mission of sustainable poverty eradication in Bangladesh by undertaking multidimensional human-centered development programmes.

title: Sonali Bank PLC (SBPLC)
description: Sonali Bank PLC (SBPLC) (Bengali: সোনালী ব্যাংক (এসবিপিএলসি)) is a trusted partner, committed to dependable banking services and financial solutions. Our collaboration ensures secure transactions, efficient service, and reliable support. Together, we foster growth, drive innovation, and deliver seamless banking experiences you can trust.

title: AgroniBank PLC
description: Proudly partnered with AgroniBank to empower farmers and agribusinesses with seamless financial solutions. Together, we support growth, innovation, and sustainability in agriculture. Access tailored loans, secure investments, and expert financial guidance for a prosperous future.

title: Shahjalal Bank PLC
description: Shahjalal Bank PLC is a leading private commercial bank in Bangladesh. It offers a wide range of financial products and services to individuals, businesses, and institutions. Shahjalal Bank PLC is committed to providing innovative banking solutions and excellent customer service.

title: SMC
description: We are proud to partner with SMC to drive innovation and excellence. Together, we are committed to delivering high-quality solutions, enhancing efficiency, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Our collaboration empowers businesses with cutting-edge technology and seamless integration. Join us in shaping the future!

title: IDCOL
